snippet: The history of Silicon Valley suggests that expensive purchases of start-ups by start-ups may not always be so crazy, Somini Sengupta and Nick Bilton report for The New York Times.
abstract: The history of Silicon Valley suggests that expensive purchases of start-ups by start-ups may not always be so crazy, Somini Sengupta and Nick Bilton report for The New York Times.

headline.main: Facebook Plays Offense and Defense in a Single Deal
